message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper is primarily focused on computer vision (CV) and robotics (RO) as it deals with the estimation of optical flow in natural scenes. The paper also involves the use of machine learning techniques (LG) and artificial intelligence (AI) to estimate the camera motion and 3D structure of the scene. Additionally, the paper involves the use of geometric reasoning (GR) to estimate the optical flow in mostly rigid scenes. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.CV and cs.RO, followed by cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.GR.
